name: untilyouaresonude
text:
I love this strip for nothing more than the very beginning.

I LOOOOOVE YOUUUUUUUUUUU!

name: whuppins
text: Same here. Give me those first 3 panels and you can have the rest.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I feel like he is just singing that song from "Howdy Doody Time". You know...Skimma marinky dinky dink, simma marinky do. Iiiiiii looooooove yoouuuuu!" It goes on to mention loving in the morning, afternoon, evening, and underneath the moon, if I am not mistaken.

name: tombsgrave
text: I think of "Fly Me to the Moon," myself.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: A comment left by untilyouaresonude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mr_lostman28, rowboat, LRosetw8)

name: geesycreesy
text: But he also says that he's walking through the woods, not by a lake. So he's probably trying to cover his "Silly Love Songs" loving hinder on all counts.

name: gouldgonewild
text: You think that people would have had enough of those, anyway.

name: dapooka
text: What's wrong with that?  I'd like to know.

name: tekende
text: 'Cause here I go...

name: gouldgonewild
text:
(Don't do it...resist the urge...)
AGAAAAAAAAAAAAAAIN!

name: ravindra108
text: Chubbies all around for the Wings reference, and for actually knowing the words.

name: coldfrog
text: Ray strikes me as the type of guy who calls any outdoors type of area "The Woods".

name: pez
text: yeah, i got "silly love songs" out of this too

name: rowboat
text: Pixies.

name: boredom_man
text: Thank you, Rowboat. Reading the other comments on my page very nearly made me finalize my 32-year-old plan to strangle Paul McCartney with his own entrails. Your superior taste may well have saved his life. I thank you, and a frikkin' battalion of post-menopausal real estate agents thank you.

name: lizjones
text: I am totally with you on that.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I believe you're referring to [url=en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Elephant_Show] Sharon, Lois & Bram's Elephant Show[/url].

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I mean, Sharon, Lois & Bram's Elephant Show .

name: deusoma
text: Hell yes. I remember loving the crap out of this show as a child, yet can't actually remember anything about it other than that song.

name: ravindra108
text: That is a common affliction.

name: rocketbunny
text: I remember a large, bearded, Vikingish man called Eric, who, despite getting as much screen time as Sharon & Co., was not part of the trio.

name: jyuu
text: I started doing all the hand motions as I recalled the lyrics. Dammit.

name: c_dizzle
text: That's what i heard.

name: littleherrdoktor
text: i hate to split hairs (i love to split hairs), but that is the song from the elephant show. i believe the song from howdy doody goes "it's howdy doody time" for a while. there might be other lyrics. who knows.

name: coffeeannan
text: Ray is all about the Sharon, Lois & Bram. Skin-a-ma-rinky-dinky-dink.

name: leia
text: He is totally totally singing Silly Love Song by Paul McCartney

name: leia
text: Seriously I can hear the bass line start up

name: singtralala
text: i had to make it into an animated gif

name: fineoakstructure
text: ...YOUUUUU!

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I want to note that the reason I posted this 5 months ago was because, in Internet Explorer, singtralala's animated gif icon only said "I..." "LOOOOVE..." and never showed the "YOUUUUUU!" part; so, I thought I was completing it for him.

I'm looking at it now in Firefox, and it does indeed have entire 3 panel gag in the gif.

I am sorry about this, singtralala.

name: rowboat
text: My home/work computer life is divided between Firefox and Internet Explorer, too. I can back you up on this. I will back you up this.

name: woodenteeth
text: 1 year later and I am looking at the SAME DAMN PROBLEM... but then my office apparently doesn't feel the need to upgrade us from IE6

name: fermatprime
text: JESUH-US CHRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIST

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: this might be my favorite

name: never_die
text: ray feels like a bad uncle.

name: straw
text: Ray does not watch the news for any reason

name: tekende
text: I don't either. Unless it's on a TV at a bar I happen to be at.

name: straw
text: I make it a habit to not go into bars where there is news on the television.  Unless it's sports news, that doesn't count.

name: tekende
text: Well, around here the network news is like 60% sports anyway.

name: jerkface
text:
my thoughts:
chuck smuck
chuckles smuckles
chuckey smuckey

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text: for the longest time I thought that the "honk!" was coming from Ray's nose

name: the_doz
text: Wait, what? Isn't it... ohhhhhhhh, now I see it! GOD that is obvious!

name: spinynorman
text: Yeah, me too for a while.

name: foetus_punch
text: I thought that Ray just saw a webcam, and made the logical assumption to honk quietly at it. "Huh, a webcam. Well, I guess it's honkin' time".

name: rowboat
text: This action is so poorly conveyed.

name: skyliner
text: Alt Text: Keep an eye out for the new Ray Smuckles song, I LOVE YOU

name: estutius
text: The "'05" implies that Little Nephew has a reputation.

name: captainpeepers
text: Little Nephew's name is Charley. I just realized this.

name: mikeleffel2
text: ray...  charles...

name: yingkaixing
text: My mind is officially blown.

name: bozendoka
text: Your avatar is so perfect for that comment.

name: vondicus
text: WHOOOOAAA

name: deusoma
text: I only just realized that even though Ray is an idiot, all his friends have been aware that Neff is killing himself slowly on the Internet and have done nothing about it other than trying to tell his Uncle about it.

name: hyetal
text: The last panel of this comic reminds of me the last panel of this comic: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=09112003

name: mastronaut
text: Oh man, I didn't See this here before. You beat me to it.

name: werewolves
text: The cat carries around a cellular phone just so he can yell at whoever calls him.

name: mastronaut
text: Dear.God.I.Am.Not.A.Religious.Man.But.Help.Me.To.See.The.Connection.Here.

name: agentj
text: Ray...Pays Attention

name: niraj
text: If Ray didn't want to get interrupted, why did he have his phone with him at all?

name: niraj
text: Aw hell, looks like I got semi beaten two months ago

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I got a cold, but I did not get bubble butt. Unfair.
Teodor: Recurring dream.
Lyle: golf abals
Onstad: Results of the "Tell Me Where To Move" contest!

name: dasuta
text: A comment left by dasuta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pumpinpedal, Deusoma, chivalress)

name: dasuta
text: I think you all knew where I was going with that.

name: lowtrees
text: You know how hard it would be to drive consistently at one inch per hour? Hard. Respect to Charley.

name: akarroa
text: It looks like Ray was walking on a river.

name: ishuta
text: Ray, Ray of Light

name: d3athcann0n
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: puguglypress
text: I like how you changed the timing there, so "I" is held for a long time instead of "love you". Makes it a whole new song.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its kinda trippy that you have a animated gif as your avatar, flashing right above this giant aniamted gif.

name: nabeel84
text: His name's Charley!

name: hyetal
text: Ray sees a camera, and he examines the camera.  Not until he gets an aural cue does he consider what the camera is looking at.

name: pan-optic
text:
The camera is looking at him, of course.
This is the natural order of things in his experience.

name: xud
text: And I love you! Because I have learned that plutonic love CAN exist between two grown cats.

name: shakey
text: I love how for about the last 10 panels, rays eyebrows tell the story.
